body.p: Information about the current element being edited is also available in various dockable views, such as the Model view, Attributes view, Elements view, and Entities view. By default, they are located on the right-hand side of the main editor window. These views, along with the powerful Outline view, provide spatial and insight information about the edited document and the current element. If any particular view is not displayed, it can be opened by selecting it from the Window Show View menu.
